alert.note: Alert for Eastern Columbia; Eastern Ulster; Western Columbia; Western Dutchess; Western Greene; Western Ulster (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 12 at 4:53AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...Showers with gusty winds will impact portions of Ulster, northwestern Dutchess, Columbia and Greene Counties through 600 AM EST... At 452 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking showers with gusty winds along a line extending from Preston-Potter Hollow to near Parksville. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Kingston, New Paltz, Hudson, Ellenville, Catskill, Saugerties, Rhinebeck, Chatham, Hunter, Wallkill, Hyde Park, Plattekill, Hurley, Claverack, Woodstock, Livingston, New Baltimore, Coxsackie, Highland and Clermont. This includes Interstate 87 between exits 18 and 21B. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Columbia; Eastern Ulster; Western Columbia; Western Dutchess; Western Greene; Western Ulster
